query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZWBMESG( MANDT , MESGSEND , MESGNUMB , MESGACCP , MESGTITL , MESGDESC , MESGCHEK , MESGDATE , MESGTIME , MESGFNAM , MESGFSIZ , MESGACDE , MESGSEDE , MESGACTM ) SELECT MANDT , SUBSTR(APNUM,2) , (SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(MESGNUMB) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(MESGNUMB) + 1 END AS MAX_SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZWBMESG WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MESGSEND = SUBSTR(APNUM,2) WITH UR) , MESGACCP , '견적 결재가 승인되었습니다. (결재문서번호 : '||DOCNO||')' --, '(견적번호 '||ETN||' : '||SIR||'차) '||APDPT1_N||' '||APIRUM||'('||APRNK||')님이 '||TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(APDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD')||'에 최종승인하셨습니다.' ,CAST('(견적번호 '||ETN||' : '||SIR||'차) '||APDPT1_N||' '||APIRUM||'('||APRNK||')님이 '||TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(APDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD')||'에 최종승인하셨습니다.' AS VARCHAR(500)) , 'N' , HEX(CURRENT DATE) , HEX(CURRENT TIME) , '' , 0 , 'N' , 'N' , '' FROM (SELECT A.*, B.MESGACCP , CASE WHEN VALUE(CS301.CS301_TEM,'') > '' THEN CS301.CS301_TEM || '-' || CS301.CS301_RDT || '-' || CS301.CS301_SEQ ELSE '' END ETN , CS301_SIR AS SIR FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY WB02.APPGUBN, WB02.SEQNO DESC) AS RNUM , WB01.MANDT, WB01.DOCNO, WB02.APDPT1_N, WB02.APRNK, WB02.APIRUM, WB02.APDATE, WB02.APTIM, WB02.APNUM FROM SAPHEE.ZWBAP01 WB01 , SAPHEE.ZWBAP02 WB02 WHERE WB01.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND WB01.MANDT = WB02.MANDT AND WB01.DOCNO = #DOCNO# AND WB01.DOCNO = WB02.DOCNO AND WB01.APSTAT = '6') A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CS301_MID AS MESGACCP FROM SAPHEE.ZCST301 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS301_DOC = #DOCNO# AND CS301_DEL <> 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT CS649_BNU FROM SAPHEE.ZCST649 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS649_DOC = #DOCNO# FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) B ON 1=1 , SAPHEE.ZCST301 CS301 WHERE A.MANDT = CS301.MANDT AND A.DOCNO = CS301.CS301_DOC AND SUBSTR(A.APNUM,1,1) = 'H' AND CS301_DEL <> 'Y' AND RNUM = 1 ) WITH UR
